snippet: Residents of Iguala, Mexico, searching for students who disappeared after a clash with the police, have not found them, but they have found mass graves.
abstract: Search in Iguala, Mexico, for 43 missing students has yet to confirm their fate, despite fact that hundreds of soldiers, federal officers, state personnel and local residents are on their trail; five mass graves have been discovered, and another half dozen secret burial sites are being tested to determine origins of remains inside.

byline.contributor: Paulina Villegas contributed reporting from Mexico City

lead_paragraph: Residents of Iguala, Mexico, searching for students who disappeared after a clash with the police, have not found them, but they have found mass graves.

headline.main: Mexico Finds Many Corpses, but Not Lost 43
headline.print_headline: Mexico Finds Many Corpses, but Not Lost 43

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Escuela Normal Rural Raul Isidro Burgos (Guerrero, Mexico)
